p.k: Real Life Story, Classic, Art Japan (1949). Hrají: Toshiro Mifune, Takashi Shimura, Miki Sanjo, Kenjiro Uemura. Režie: Akira Kurosawa.
p.d: A surgeon gets syphilis from a patient when he cuts himself during an operation. The doctor's life is destroyed, but unlike the patient, he doesn't destroy others along with him.
